feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Fiori
feed.subtitle: SAP Fiori Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: What is the url for SAP FIORI to acces from chrome
entry.content: I want to know the URL for accessing the FIORI from chrome directly, what is the link. And if anyone knows a good YouTube channel that guides FIORI usage like how it must be done, the order etc. Please suggest me one.

entry.title: How to consume OData service in Fiori app using approuter and destination in Cloud Foundry (404 Not
entry.content:
Hello Community,

I am developing a CAP project on SAP BTP, Cloud Foundry. I want to consume an OData V4 service from a Fiori (UI5) application using approuter and a destination.

- Backend (CAP, OData V4):
https://<subdomain>-back.cfapps.<region>.hana.ondemand.com/odata/v4/invitacion/ReadProveedor

- Frontend (Fiori + approuter):
https://<subdomain>-frontend.cfapps.<region>.hana.ondemand.com/frontfront/index.html

### Approuter (xs-app.json)
```json
{
"welcomeFile": "/frontfront/index.html",
"routes": [
{
"source": "^/backend/(.*)$",
"target": "/$1",
"destination": "SRV_BACKEND",
"authenticationType": "xsuaa"
}
]
}

 

 

Destination in BTP cockpit

  • Name: SRV_BACKEND
  • URL: https://-back.cfapps..hana.ondemand.com
  • ProxyType: Internet
  • Authentication: OAuth2JWTBearer

 

Frontend manifest.json

"dataSources": {
"backend_odata": {
"uri": "/backend/odata/v4/invitacion/",
"type": "OData",
"settings": { "odataVersion": "4.0" }
}
}

 

Problem

When the app tries to load metadata (/backend/odata/v4/invitacion/$metadata), I receive 404 Not Found.

Accessing the backend service directly via its URL works fine.

What I tried

  • Verified that the destination exists in BTP cockpit and points to the backend URL.
  • Checked the backend service directly (responds correctly).
  • Reviewed approuter logs — I see messages like “Missing internal url for request …”.

What configuration should I adjust in the approuter or the destination so that the frontend Fiori app can correctly consume the OData service via /backend/...?

Any guidance or working examples would be greatly appreciated

entry.title: Print to local Printer from Fiori
entry.content:
Hello

We are migrating from SAP ECC 6 to S/4 HANA and we are switching from SAPGUI to 100% Fiori.

We noticed that when users send to print from Fiori, it does not recognize the Local Printer that users have as default in Windows., when they send from SAP GUI it does recognize the local printer, but not from Fiori

Does anyone has had this issue and could solve it ?

Thanks a lot

Sergio

entry.title: smart filter bar not visible after smart table personalisation in SAP Fiori custom app.
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

We have developed a custom Fiori application using Smart Filter bar and Smart table. 

When we create a custom variant using personalization and set the variant as default the smart filter bar is not visible this happens after we logoff and login again. 

 

We are not seeing any issue if we set the variant as standard. We haven't done any customization in the coding as we just mapped entityset and kept "useperonization=true".

 

KR,

Anji

entry.title: FIORI APP extensibility
entry.content:
I need to extend a standard Fiori application with a custom field. Normally, the recommended approach would be to use the Custom Fields and Logic app, which automatically creates a new field (with the ZZ1_ prefix) in the relevant table and exposes it to Fiori.

However, in my case, the situation is different:

The customer has already added a custom field ZCLASS in table MARD using an append structure and this field is already in use across multiple forms, reports (so it’s business critical)

If I use the Custom Fields and Logic app now, it will create a new field ZZ1_CLASS in MARD, which would lead to redundant fields for the same purpose.

My question is what is the correct approach to resolve this issue?

Thank you In advance

entry.title: Fiori screen issue
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

Good day,

Has anyone here experienced the Fiori screen size suddenly changing?

Before, it was fitting to the screen, but it suddenly shifted to the corner.

We tried using a different browser, but the same issue occurred, which wasn’t the case before.

Is there any notes to fix the issue?

Please see attached image 1 for before the issue and image 2 for the current situation.

 

Thank you in advance!

Best regards,

-Jaspher

entry.title: Cancel Billing Document (VF11) – Billing Document field always resets to previous
entry.content:
When using the Fiori app Cancel Billing Document (VF11), the Billing Document input field always reverts to the previously cancelled document:

I cancel a billing document, and the number remains in the VF11 screen. When I try to enter another billing document, the field is cleared and the previous number reappears

I checked my user parameters and looked for any application variants, but did not find any.

entry.title: Change the application title on the detail page of Perform Maintenance Jobs
entry.content:
Through an adaptation project, we've made some changes to the Perform Maintenance Jobs app (F5104A). We gave the adaptation the title "<company> Perform Maintenance Jobs". Now this is what shows up at the top of the page next to our logo. This is good.

But when the user clicks on one of the maintenance jobs in the list, it goes to a page with application title "Perform Maintenance Job". We'd like to change that so it says "<company> Perform Maintenance Job". How would we do that?

I've tried going back to the adaptation project, but there's nothing there to set that detail page title -- as far as I can tell anyway.

I think it may have to do with the technical and business catalogs. There's two entries for F5104A, one for the Maintenance Job, and one for the Maintenance Notification, and their titles match the two we see in the original app. I've tried copying the second one to my TC, and changing the title there, and have the BC reflect this also, but that didn't work. Somehow, I would have to tell our adapted tile to use the adapted target mapping for the Notification.

entry.title: How to add multiple related objects to a workitem in My Inbox app for a custom flexible workflow?
entry.content:
Hello experts,
I have a requirement to set multiple related objects in the Related Objects tab of a work item belongs to a custom flexible workflow that I developed.
I have already researched through various sources (Google, SAP Notes...), but I could not find a solution.
Could anyone who has experience in this area suggest or guide me on how to configure or implement this requirement?

Thank you in advance for your support.

entry.title: Multiple Table views in Fiori App via RAP not working
entry.content:
I tried to get Multiple Table Views via RAP, in an OData V4 Fiori App, but it is not working.

In the metadata annotation I added the following in bold: 

@ui: { headerInfo: { title:{ value: 'MissionNeedsNumber' }, typeName: 'Product List', typeNamePlural: 'Product Lists', description:{ value: 'MissionName' } },

presentationVariant: [{ sortOrder: [{ by: 'MissionNeedsNumber', direction: #DESC }], visualizations: [{type: #AS_LINEITEM}] } ],

selectionVariant: [ {

text: 'completed (2 Ranges)',

qualifier: 'Completed'

},

{

text: 'In Process',

qualifier: 'InProcess'

} ] }

@ui.createHidden: #(hide_create)

annotate view zc_mn_missionneeds with

 

Source: https://github.com/SAP-samples/fiori-elements-feature-showcase/blob/main/README.md#general-features

In the metadata xml in can see it is getting loaded when opening the App. See bold part.

 

</Annotation>
<Annotation Term="SAP__UI.SelectionVariant" Qualifier="InProcess">
<Record>
<PropertyValue Property="Text" String="In Process"/>
</Record>
</Annotation>
<Annotation Term="SAP__UI.SelectionVariant" Qualifier="Completed">
<Record>
<PropertyValue Property="Text" String="completed (2 Ranges)"/>
</Record>
</Annotation>
<Annotation Term="Communication.Contact">

 

 Still, there are no text tabs on the List screen.

 

What am I doing wrong? Of course I don't do an actual selection yet, but I at least expected the text tabs to be present on the App list screen.

entry.title: Develop a custom Asset Accounting report using CDS Views.
entry.content:
Dear SAP Support,

We are planning to develop a custom Asset Accounting report using CDS Views. The report should include the following information at the asset level:

Depreciation for the year
Current APC (Acquisition and Production Cost)
Accumulated Depreciation
Acquisition values
Retirement values

We would like to request your guidance on:

The recommended CDS Views (standard or released views) that can be leveraged to retrieve these fields.
Any reference logic, data sources, or associations we should use to ensure correct values and reconciliation with Asset Accounting.

Best practices for building custom CDS-based reports for Asset Accounting in S/4HANA (e.g., use of released I_ views, composite views, etc.).

Could you kindly share:

The list of relevant CDS Views (e.g., for depreciation, APC, acquisition, retirement).
Example logic or data model reference that explains how these values are derived in standard Asset Reporting.
This will help us ensure that our custom report is aligned with standard SAP logic and reconciles correctly with Asset Accounting.

Thank you for your support.


Best Regards,
Balaraj

entry.title: Error While Creating Extension Project in SAP Business Application Studio
entry.content:
I am encountering the following error when trying to create an extension project using the SAP Adaptation Project template:

"The Extensibility Project generator plugin was not found in your dev space and it is required for this action. To proceed, please install the 'SAPUI5 Layout Editor & Extensibility' extension."

However, my Fiori dev space already contains SAPUI5 Layout Editor & Extensibility as a predefined extension, but I am still facing the same issue.

entry.title: Integration of Fiori Launchpad with Service Now
entry.content:
Hello Everyone, 

I need some guidance regarding the integration of Fiori Launchpad with Service Now.

We liked to have a create incident button from the fiori app (as a copy of the sap standard app support) to create a ticket directly in Service Now. An incident including the automatic attachment of relevant logs and screenshots (SAP component, Apps Id , error messages, logs and optionally screenshots provided by the user. 

We need a create incident button like this as below which will directly take it to snow ticket creation. 

Your guidance will be highly appreciated.

entry.title: Missing IDATYPE in USR21
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

We’re currently using the Fiori app “Manage Teams and Responsibilities” and have encountered an issue when trying to add employees to a team.

The app displays a list of users eligible to be added, and we’ve identified that the key criterion for inclusion is the IDTYPE field in table USR21. Specifically, only users with IDTYPE = 2 or 4 appear in the selection list.

However, we’ve noticed that some users have no IDTYPE set at all (the field is blank in USR21), which means they’re excluded from the app’s selection list.

We’ve already tried assigning a workplace to these users via SU01, hoping that would trigger the IDTYPE to be set to 4 — but unfortunately, it didn’t change anything.

Our question: How can we set or populate the IDTYPE for these users so they become visible in the app?

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Migrate Fiori hub on ECC system to SAP S/4 HANA 2023 Embedded Fiori
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

We plan to migrate the Fiori Hub system on top of SAP ECC system to Embedded Fiori System in SAP S/4 HANA 2023 Private Cloud(RISE with SAP). As per the migration document https://www.sap.com/documents/2019/10/881124de-6d7d-0010-87a3-c30de2ffd8ff.html  we can move the customization done on Fiori Hub system by Workbench and Customzation transport to S/4 HANA Embedded Fiori System. This migration document shows source and target system as S/4 HANA system.

Question: Since we have Fiori Hub system on top of SAP ECC system, can we move customization/custom development done on Fiori Hub system via transport request to SAP S/4 HANA Embedded Fiori as part of migration or In SAP S/4 HANA Embedded Fiori system do we need to manually create all the customization/custom developments that were originally developed in Fiori Hub system as part of migration? Please clarify

@Jocelyn_Dart 

 

Regards,

Abdul Hakim

entry.title: F1602 Manage Product Master Data - to many tabs
entry.content:
Hi everyone.

We want to use the app F1602 – Manage Product Master Data. But unfortunately, the app always displays all tabs (General Information, Product Compliance, Components, Classification, … Warehouse Management, …), even though we have configured the material type so that only General Information, Sales Data, and Accounting should be displayed. Where can we configure the app so that it only shows the views defined in the material type?

 

Kind regards - Sven

entry.title: F0797 App Extension OData Service - Manage Billing Docs.
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I have successfully created a Fiori Extension Project in BAS for Fiori App F0797: Manage Billing Documents. I added a new custom action/button to the worklistview. The new button will update the billing date for the records selected in the worklist. In my app preview, the button is displayed correctly, and the popup is also working as expected and provided the user with the option to select the new billing date.

How to tie this to the backend SAP system for processing?
The OData project in SEGW is SD_CUSTOMER_INVOICES_MANAGE. My question is, do I need to create a copy of this project and add my custom logic in the DPC_EXT class?  Or, am I able to create a new service entirely and add it to my Extension project in BAS? The new service would only be enabled for my custom action/button. What is the preferred approach when extending Fiori Apps which are UI5 based?

Attached are my worklist custom controller. 

Br,
Jared

entry.title: Fiori Overview Page – Card visibility not updating when switching variants
entry.content:
Hello,

I am working with an Overview Page (OVP) Fiori dashboard that contains multiple cards. I have created several variants where some cards are shown and others are hidden, depending on the variant.

The issue I am facing is that when I switch from one variant to another, the card visibility does not update as expected. The cards remain in the same hidden/visible state as the previous variant, instead of reflecting the configuration of the newly selected variant.

Has anyone encountered this behavior? Is there a specific setting or workaround required to ensure that card visibility is correctly updated when switching between variants?
